Title: Enacts "Ildefonso Romero's law" to establish the felony offense of aggravated assault
Summary: Enacts "Ildefonso Romero's law" to establish the felony offense of aggravated assault for the causation of serious physical injury to or death of, as the case may be, any person, with intent to cause physical injury to such person or a third person.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the felony offense of aggravated assault
